name: Emilia
description:
"I will find a way to break this loop to save you from this destiny of suffering."

Merlin woke up in the middle of the forest. For he know nothing but his name, magic, and his memory to save Emilia. Who is Emilia? Why he woke up in the forest? Those answers could only be answered by venturing deep into the forest and find what lies await. 

Concept:

Emilia is a Top-Down Story-based Adventure game that requires the player to find all the answers by themself. All clues are already scattered and the goal of the player it to find the exit from this forest. There will be some obstacles and some puzzle in this game. To help player get through the obstacle and the puzzle, player can cast spell with magic command by typing the available magic command. This game is consisted of several chapter. But for now, the only chapter that is released is Chapter 0: Forest of Everlasting Dream. There is not so much plot from this itch.io page because this game's final objective is to uncover the story all by yourself.  

PS: There is 2 ending in this game, try to find all the ending by paying attention to every clue you get.

How to play:
  • Press the "Right" ( → ) or "Left" (  ← )  "Up" ( ↑ )  "Down" ( ↓ ) to move
  • Press E to interact with items in the game
  • Press Enter to bring up magic command
  • Press Esc to bring pause menu 
  • To view list of magic command, go to Pause menu -> Controls
